description:
Eiji Busujima was a delinquent in middle school, but now that he’s in high school, he’s trying to put all that behind him. He’s even joined the literature club! Unfortunately, while Eiji’s heart might be in the right place, his face didn’t get the memo, and if his scowling, slit-like eyes don’t scare people away, then his attempts at senryu poetry probably will. But there’s one member of the literature club who isn’t easily intimidated: Nanako Yukishiro, an odd but cheerful young woman who never speaks and communicates only through senryu poetry! So, when the meddling president of the club decides to encourage a relationship between this strange literary pair, the haiku is sure to fly!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

node.description:
[Website](https://highkick.jp/tateyama)

He is a drummer for the Japanese rock band THE LINDA!, which was formed in 2002 when its members were enrolled at Rikkyo University.

**Height:** 150cm

[Website](https://rikakoaida.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Rikako_Aida) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/aida_rikako_/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfwvbv52NmPIHMIVDp3Jqrw)

Rikako Aida is a Japanese actress, voice actress and singer from Tokyo, Japan. She is best known for her role as Riko Sakurauchi from Love Live! Sunshine!!. She is affiliated with Ken Production.

On August 21, 2024, she made her VTuber debut as Rikyako (りきゃこ). 

**Non-anime roles:**
• Merlyn - Memento Mori (VG)
• Desert Flannel - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
• Quartz - Arknights (VG)
• CAWS - Girls' Frontline (VG)
• EM-2 - Girls' Frontline (VG)
Affiliated with Weekly Shounen's Editorial Apartment.

Hiroo Maruyama is a producer working for Mainichi Broadcasting System (MBS).

He joined Mainichi Broadcasting in 1999. Was transferred later to the Tokyo office and took over duties relating to the production of animation broadcasts. He was responsible for production on series like Gundam Seed, Gundam Seed Destiny and Full Metal Alchemist, all part of the 6:00pm Saturday timeblock, which gained wide popularity.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mikamw)**

**Masataka Mikami** is a Japanese music producer.
